CustomField.formula: OR( ISPICKVAL( copado__Dependency_Status__c ,'Completed'), ISPICKVAL( copado__Dependency_Status__c ,'Deferred'), ISPICKVAL( copado__Dependency_Status__c ,'Never'))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The value is set to True whenever a Dependency Status is set to Completed, Deferred, or Never.
CustomField.label: Skip Dependency
